snippet: The franchise received plenty of attention for moving to Brooklyn, but a subsequent 1-2 start, including a 30-point loss against the Heat, has not gone unnoticed.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets are receiving plenty of attention for moving to the Barclays Center, but subsequent 1-2 start, including 30-point loss to Miami Heat, has not gone unnoticed.
lead_paragraph: The franchise received plenty of attention for moving to Brooklyn, but a subsequent 1-2 start, including a 30-point loss against the Heat, has not gone unnoticed.

headline.seo: Nets Caught Between Off-Season Hype and a Slow Start
headline.main: Nets Are Caught Between Hype and a Slow Start
headline.print_headline: Nets Are Caught Between Hype and a Slow Start
